name: Metolius PU Mega Pack 60
description: A great way to get your home wall started. The hold selection varies from kit to kit (sorry no choice), but each kit includes a balanced blend of big, medium and small holds, screw-on hand and foot holds, micro bolt-on crimpers, really big roof jugs, and positive-to-grab little juglets.60 polyurethane holds included.Bolts, T-nuts, and wrenches included.Includes instructions for building a home wall.
